segments.text: I see the girl standing there, just waiting for her cookie like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care that her brother is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is already tilting, but she’s just staring at the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and I think he’s going to lose his balance any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is making the floor a slippery mess, but she’s not even looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how focused she is on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely clueless about what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is going to be disappointed if her brother falls before she gets her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just waiting to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll even react if he does fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
